title: Essential Oils for Meditation: Meditate with These 3 Essential Oils to Increase Your Concentration Level
description: The truth is like every other thing, you need to practice to master this skill. It takes several weeks or even months for people to calm down their minds and channelize their energy.
cleaned_text: quite helpful! If you have ever tried meditating, you would know that it is not a child's play. It is not an easy task to switch off your mind, sit down in peace for a while and forget all your worries. Most of the people who try mediation find it difficult to control their thoughts. Their mind wanders to several places and after some time they get bored or anxious and call it quit. The truth is like every other thing, you need to practice to master this skill. It takes several weeks or even months for people to calm down their minds and channelize their energy. There are plenty of reasons why you should meditate every day. As per studies, it helps to lower your blood pressure, slow down the ageing of the brain, reduce stress, anxiety, and negative emotions. There are several things that can help you meditate better and essential oils are among them. Essential oils are aromatic extracts of plants that have significant therapeutic properties. It can be used in several ways. You can either rub some drops of oil on your skin or diffuse it into the air to calm your mind, boost mood, and relieve stress. Here are 3 essential oils that can increase your concentration level: [readmore](javascript://) 02/4Sandalwood oil Sandalwood has a calming effect and has been used since ancient times for spiritual purposes in different religions. Sandalwood oil not only calms your mind but also promotes mental clarity, which helps a lot when you are meditating. It helps your mind get rid of negative thoughts and promotes a feeling of inner peace. [readmore](javascript://) 03/4Lavender oil Lavender oil is famous for its ability to relax your entire body, from head to toe. The soothing lavender fragrance relaxes your mind, promotes emotional stability and mental clarity. It increases your concentration power, reduces anxiety, sadness and restlessness. [readmore](javascript://) 04/4Clary sage Clary sage can help to clear negative thoughts and energy. This essential oil improves your mood, help to concentrate better and focus on your breathing. It also promotes emotional balance, alertness and enhances memory recall.
